channel.title: Game is Running, Cannot launch with SML Launched
channel.description: I dont know if that is a Bug or intended, I cannot run satisfactory from SML, after a while the Epic launch tells me ls0018 game is already running. It worked earlier for me, but now i always get this message.

item.title: Game is Running, Cannot launch with SML Launched
item.dc:creator: @NemesisXKL2 Nemesis Xkl2
item.description:
@NemesisXKL2 wrote:

I dont know if that is a Bug or intended, I cannot run satisfactory from SML, after a while the Epic launch tells me ls0018 game is already running. It worked earlier for me, but now i always get this message.

Read full topic
